data.eml:eml: Redescription of Coronatella poppei (Richard, 1897) (Crustacea, Branchiopoda, Chydoridae) and a revision of the genus in Brazil, with descriptions of new taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sousa, Francisco Diogo Rocha, Elmoor-Loureiro, Lourdes Maria Abdu, Santos, Sandro (2015): Redescription of Coronatella poppei (Richard, 1897) (Crustacea, Branchiopoda, Chydoridae) and a revision of the genus in Brazil, with descriptions of new taxa. Zootaxa 3955 (2): 211-244, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3955.2.3
